name: Don't Need You
description:
Made in 48 hours for Jim Jam, it's a game inspired by the music video of "Don't Need You" by "Bullet For My Valentine".

Jam Theme:
INSPIRATION!!!

Controls:
WASD - Move.
SPACE - Jump.
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Grab/Throw objects.

Works with joysticks too!

Idea:
So my idea is based on the music video "Don't Need You" by "Bullet For My Valentine" where there is a wedding party and at the end a huge fight with a lot of throwing objects at each other! Inspired by that, I made a casual action game where you grab the objects around the place to throw at your undesirable guests!
